metadata.title: CVE-2019-6131 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
svg-run.c in Artifex MuPDF 1.14.0 has infinite recursion with stackconsumption in svg_run_use_symbol, svg_run_element, and svg_run_use, asdemonstrated by mutool.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6131` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.14.0+ds1-3
mupdf-tools - 1.14.0+ds1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14.0+ds1-3').
